description.lang: The Door/Window Sensor is a wireless, battery powered, Z-Wave compatible reed sensor.Each time the sensors body and a magnet separate, a radio signal is sent.In addition, the Door/Window Sensor supports one potential-free input and self-power adapter of DC 9V~30V.The Door/Window Sensor is designed for use with home automation systems, alarm and surveillance systems and everywhere else where information related to opening/closing of doors, garage, gates.
Group1:u0022Lifelineu0022 :Group1 is used to send Sensor trigger status(BATTERY, NOTIFICATION, DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY NOTIFICATION) to the controller.
Group2:u0022Sensor Reed repu0022:When the Sensor Reed rep is triggered, a NOTIFICATION REPORT is sent to the Device in Group2.
Group3:u0022Sensor Tamper repu0022:When the Sensor Tamper rep is triggered, a NOTIFICATION REPORT is sent to the Device in Group3.
Group4:u0022Sensor S1 repu0022: When the Sensor S1 rep is triggered, a NOTIFICATION REPORT is sent to the Device in Group4.
Group5:u0022Sensor S2 repu0022:When the Sensor S2 rep is triggered, a NOTIFICATION REPORT is sent to the Device in Group5.
The interval time of sending Battery Report when the battery runs out of electricity.
Set the configuration of 2 external sensors.0 (00b): S1 NO, S2 NO1 (01b):S1 NO,S2 NC2 (10b):S1 NC,S2 NO3 (11b):S1 NC,S2 NC
